1.content: First, let's pick a character.
1.title: Pick a character

11.content:
You are Kyle, you are a seventeen years old have brown hair and green eyes you are on vacation and were looking for work to make some cash since you were a little light these days

You look around on the internet for some work and apply for some of them online then something catches your attention it was an advertisement for a babysitting job going on near your house that was paying alright all you had to do was babysit the kids for a week while the mother was away for business

There was a number to call and you decided to give it a shot you called the number on your phone then after a few rings the someone answered

“Hello my name is Kyle I am calling you about the babysitting job you put up online” you say immediately

“That is great news Kyle I was doubting that anyone would respond to my advertisement after a couple days on nobody calling” a feminine voice answered

“So do I have to go and get an interview so to see if I am acceptable for the job and meet the kids” you ask

“I would love to but I am running out of time so I you will have to do since I haven’t heard from anyone and I am getting desperate” she replied

“Sure when do I have to start the job” you ask unsure about things but you wanted a job and this has got to be easy looking after kids

“Well I have to head out tomorrow so will you be able to be ready by then” The lady said

“Yeah I just need to pack my things for a weeks stay and I should be able to make it” you responded

She gives you the details about where to go, about her kids and anything else you needed to know

info.description:
You're a 17 year old boy or a girl, who takes a week long babysitting job but the tables get turned and soon you end up being the one who's babysat. No sex scenes or killing any character.

Characters:

Kyle: The male babysitter
Jessica: The female babysitter
Amanda: Aged 11, the older of the kids you'll babysit. Thinks she's too old to be babysat and does her best to humiliate and make life difficult for her babysitters.
Josh: Aged 6, Amanda's younger brother. He still wets the bed which means there's a big stock of diapers, Pull Ups and Goodnites in the house.
